paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a new TTR variant associated with familial amyloid polyneuropathy, including penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: systemic amyloidosis presenting with carpal tunnel syndrome, peripheral neuropathy, and cardiomyopathy

individual_records.phenotype_details: systemic amyloidosis with carpal tunnel syndrome, peripheral neuropathy, and cardiomyopathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: An American kindred with systemic amyloidosis presenting with carpal tunnel syndrome, peripheral neuropathy, and cardiomyopathy is reported.

functional_data.summary: The variant results in an amino acid substitution in the A-B loop of the transthyretin molecule.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This is a newly identified variant in the TTR gene.
key_quotes: This new point mutation in exon 2 results in the amino acid substitution of serine for proline in the A-B loop of the transthyretin molecule.

extraction_metadata.notes: Full text was available for extraction.
